verses.name: Matthew 26:6
verses.text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper,

verses.name: Matthew 26:7
verses.text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment, and poured it on his head, as he sat at meat.

verses.name: Matthew 26:8
verses.text: But when his disciples saw it, they had indignation, saying, To what purpose is this waste?

verses.name: Matthew 26:9
verses.text: For this ointment might have been sold for much, and given to the poor.

verses.name: Matthew 26:10
verses.text: When Jesus understood it, he said unto them, Why trouble ye the woman? for she hath wrought a good work upon me.
